title: High ASCVD risk + HRT
message: ASCVD ≥20% — HRT not recommended. Prioritize CVD risk reduction; consider non-hormonal therapy.
action: Avoid HRT; cardiology referral; treat CVD risk factors first

title: Intermediate ASCVD risk + HRT
message: Intermediate CVD risk — weigh risks/benefits; consider safer HRT routes after specialist discussion.
action: Shared decision making; consider low-dose transdermal estrogen if indicated & risk mitigated

title: Age ≥70 + HRT
message: Age ≥70: increased risks with HRT; prefer alternatives.
action: Generally avoid systemic HRT; specialist input

title: Uncontrolled hypertension + HRT
message: Uncontrolled HTN — treat hypertension before HRT due to increased risk.
action: Control BP before considering HRT

title: High VTE risk + HRT
message: High VTE risk — HRT contraindicated.
action: Avoid HRT; urgent evaluation for thrombotic risk

title: Anticoagulant + NSAID
message: Anticoagulant + NSAID — increased bleeding risk. Prefer non-NSAID analgesics.
action: Avoid concurrent NSAIDs; use acetaminophen/alternative analgesic; check INR if warfarin

title: Anticoagulant + Aspirin
message: Dual antithrombotic therapy increases bleeding risk — review indication.
action: Review bleeding vs thrombotic benefit; specialist advice

title: Elevated breast cancer risk + HRT
message: Elevated breast cancer risk — HRT increases risk; consider alternatives & enhanced screening.
action: Caution — discuss breast screening; consider non-hormonal therapy

title: Breast cancer history + HRT
message: History of breast cancer — HRT generally contraindicated.
action: HRT contraindicated unless specialist consensus

title: High fracture risk
message: High fracture risk — initiate bone-protective therapy and reduce fall risk.
action: Consider osteoporosis therapy (bisphosphonates) and fall risk assessment

title: HRT for bone protection with low fracture risk
message: Low fracture risk — HRT for osteoporosis prevention not recommended.
action: HRT not indicated solely for bone protection if risk low

title: Severe renal impairment + renally cleared medication
message: Severe renal impairment — adjust dose or avoid medication.
action: Dose-adjust or avoid; nephrology consult

title: Elevated liver enzymes + hepatotoxic medication
message: Significant hepatic impairment — caution with hepatically-metabolized drugs.
action: Avoid or monitor closely; consider hepatology input

title: Tamoxifen + CYP2D6 inhibitor
message: CYP2D6 inhibitor reduces tamoxifen efficacy — avoid or use alternative.
action: Avoid combination; choose alternative SSRI (e.g., citalopram) or adjust therapy

title: Statin + CYP3A4 inhibitor
message: Risk of severe myopathy — avoid or change statin.
action: Avoid combination or use statin not metabolized by CYP3A4 (pravastatin)

title: Smoking + HRT over age 35
message: Smoking + estrogen >35 increases thrombotic risk — HRT contraindicated.
action: Stop smoking & avoid systemic HRT; consider non-hormonal options

title: HRT + Tamoxifen interaction
message: HRT may counteract tamoxifen effects — specialist review required.
action: Avoid combining unless under specialist advice (contradictory effects)

title: Duplicate SSRI/SNRI therapy
message: Duplicate therapy — risk of serotonin syndrome; avoid combined SSRIs.
action: Avoid duplicate therapy; choose one agent

title: Multiple sedative medications
message: Additive sedation — avoid combined sedative agents.
action: Avoid co-prescribing due to sedation/respiratory depression

title: Pregnancy + teratogenic medication
message: Teratogenic risk — medication contraindicated in pregnancy.
action: Stop teratogenic med; urgent specialist review

title: Breastfeeding + medication excreted in milk
message: Potential infant exposure via breastmilk — specialist counseling needed.
action: Discuss risks vs benefits; consider alternatives or monitoring

title: Seizure history + pro-convulsant medication
message: Seizure risk increased — avoid medications that lower seizure threshold.
action: Avoid medication or use caution with neurology advice

title: Young adult depression + antidepressant
message: Start antidepressants with close follow-up in high-risk individuals.
action: Monitor closely; safety plan

title: St John's wort interactions
message: St John's wort reduces effectiveness of many meds — avoid if on OCP/tamoxifen/warfarin.
action: Avoid due to CYP interactions (reduced efficacy)

title: Green tea extract + Warfarin
message: Green tea extracts may affect INR stability.
action: Monitor INR; counsel on interaction

title: Triple whammy: NSAID + ACE inhibitor + Diuretic
message: NSAID + ACEi + diuretic increases AKI risk — review therapy.
action: Avoid combination or monitor renal function

title: NSAID + active peptic ulcer disease
message: NSAIDs contraindicated in active PUD — avoid.
action: Avoid NSAIDs; consider PPI or alternate analgesic

title: Polypharmacy in elderly
message: Polypharmacy in older adult — perform comprehensive med review.
action: Medication review; deprescribing considered

title: Fall risk + sedative medications
message: Falls risk increased by sedatives — consider alternatives.
action: Avoid/adjust sedatives; fall-prevention measures

title: ACE inhibitor + hyperkalemia
message: Hyperkalemia — ACE inhibitors may worsen K+; correct and reassess.
action: Correct hyperkalemia before ACEi; nephrology input

title: Warfarin without INR monitoring
message: Ensure INR monitoring after initiating warfarin.
action: Baseline INR and frequent monitoring

title: Severe vasomotor symptoms + HRT contraindicated
message: HRT contraindicated — consider venlafaxine, gabapentin or CBT for symptom relief.
action: Offer non-hormonal options: SSRI/SNRI (venlafaxine), gabapentin, behavioural therapy

title: Hot flash-related insomnia
message: Non-pharmacological measures first; consider gabapentin if severe.
action: Sleep hygiene; consider low-dose gabapentin if appropriate
